subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: A Nascar spokesman said the cars for Jimmie Johnson, Denny Hamlin and Kevin Harvick were inspected in the North Carolina research and development center this week.
snippet: A Nascar spokesman said the cars for Jimmie Johnson, Denny Hamlin and Kevin Harvick were inspected in the North Carolina research and development center this week.
